title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: A Detailed Analysis of Recent Attacks on Hezbollah’s Military Infrastructures in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Several military infrastructures belonging to the Hezbollah terrorist organization; IDF forces continue to attack targets in southern Lebanon

A short time ago, an Air Force aircraft attacked military infrastructures of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Al-Manzouri and Aitharon regions in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, three launches were detected heading towards the Yiftach area in the north of the country, no damage or casualties were reported. The IDF responded with artillery fire towards the sources of the shooting.

Attached is the documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3xSjJev
